title: Bloomberg Markets: Pawlenty Says GOP Tax Bill `No Surprise'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Pawlenty Says GOP Tax Bill `No Surprise'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Tim Pawlenty, former Republican Governor of Minnesota \u0010CEO at Financial Services Roundtable\u0010\u0010Anna Edgerton\u0010Congressional Reporter \u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing House Republican leaders rolling out a tax bill Thursday that contains sweeping changes for business and individual taxes, including a measure to cut the corporate tax rate to 20 percent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
